update gdeupsb.TRSP_NP_MANAG

SQN = #{sqn,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAR_NO = #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
INV_NO = #{invNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRT_DAT = #{prtDat,jdbcType=DATE},
BEG_DAT = #{begDat,jdbcType=DATE},
END_DAT = #{endDat,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
TLR_ID = #{tlrId,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from gdeupsb.TRSP_NP_MANAG
where ID_NO in
#{item}

select NOD_NO,PRT_DAT,CAR_NO,SQN,INV_NO,ID_NO,STATUS,BEG_DAT,END_DAT,TLR_ID from gdeupsb.TRSP_NP_MANAG WHERE
(PRT_DAT BETWEEN #{begDat,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{endDat,jdbcType=DATE})
AND (NOD_NO = #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR} OR ''= #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) AND (STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} OR ''= #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}) AND (ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=CHAR} OR ''= #{idNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) AND (CAR_NO = #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR} OR ''= #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) ORDER BY ID_NO

select count(*) from gdeupsb.TRSP_NP_MANAG WHERE
(ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=CHAR} OR ''= #{idNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) AND (CAR_NO = #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR} OR ''= #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) AND PRT_DAT between #{begDat,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDat,jdbcType=DATE}
mapper.update:
update gdeupsb.TRSP_NP_MANAG
NOD_NO = #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAR_NO = #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
INV_NO = #{invNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRT_DAT = #{prtDat,jdbcType=DATE},
BEG_DAT = #{begDat,jdbcType=DATE},
END_DAT = #{endDat,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
TLR_ID = #{tlrId,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=CHAR} AND SQN = #{sqn,jdbcType=CHAR}
